alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 08 at 2:18AM CDT until October 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...DANGEROUS FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS SUNDAY AFTERNOON... The combination of very dry fuels and critically low humidities will maintain an elevated fire weather threat today. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHEAST ALABAMA... The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT Sunday. * AFFECTED AREA...Coffee, Dale, Henry, Geneva and Houston. * WIND...North 10 to 15 mph. * HUMIDITY...20 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
